LA FINCA PZ

Artisanal Hot Sauces

Contact LA FINCA PZ

LA FINCA PZ Hot Sauces

LA FINCA PZ brings the authentic taste of Costa Rica's Southern Zone to life through their handcrafted hot sauces. Using locally sourced ingredients and traditional recipes, these artisanal sauces capture the essence of Costa Rican culinary heritage.

Artisanal Quality

Each bottle of LA FINCA PZ hot sauce is carefully crafted in small batches to ensure the highest quality and flavor. The sauces feature locally grown chili peppers, herbs, and other fresh ingredients that thrive in Costa Rica's rich soil and tropical climate.

Unlike mass-produced condiments, these artisanal hot sauces offer complex flavor profiles that complement rather than overpower your food. From mild and fruity to intensely spicy, there's a variety to suit every palate.

Local Craftsmanship

The creator of LA FINCA PZ hot sauces combines traditional methods with innovative flavors, resulting in products that honor Costa Rican culinary traditions while appealing to contemporary tastes. Each recipe is perfected through careful experimentation and refined based on customer feedback.

These hot sauces make excellent souvenirs or gifts, allowing you to bring the vibrant flavors of Costa Rica back home. They add authentic Costa Rican heat and flavor to any dish, from traditional local recipes to international cuisine.

Find LA FINCA PZ

You can find LA FINCA PZ hot sauces at the Uvita Mercado. For inquiries or custom orders, contact them directly via WhatsApp at +506 6218-6229.
